welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: Cloud Storage
welcome.description: Reliable and convenient cloud storage for your files with unlimited access from any point of the world.

auth.name: Name
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must contain at least 8 characters
auth.passwordMaxLength: Password must contain at most 16 characters

accordion.title: How to create an account?
accordion.body: To create an account, go to the registration page and fill out all the required fields, including name, email and password.

accordion.title: How to upload files?
accordion.body: After logging into your account, go to the 'Home' page, select the desired folder, or create one if it does not exist.

accordion.title: How to share files?
accordion.body: To share a file, select it and click 'Make public'

accordion.title: How can I change my password?
accordion.body: To change your password, go to 'Settings', and click 'Change Password'.

accordion.title: How to contact the developer?
accordion.body: In my Github profile you can find links for communication: w01f-o

errors.mailer_error: An error occurred while sending the letter.

errors.user_with_such_email_not_found: User with this email was not found
